TopicTitle: Panzor Class Ships pack for ksp V.0.20

Articles.Content:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/34938277/Pansoz%20Class%20Ships.rar

This is Panzor Cargo Carrier MK1 it can reach a speed up to 22.1 m/s

it is made out of 222 parts

How to use

Simply get it safly in to the water

do not enter the water in more than 7 m/s

Steering

Q+A = Left ( pushing one of each wil not do anything you need to push them both

E+D = Right ( pushing one of each wil not do anything you need to push them both

===================================================================================

This is Panzor Cargo Carrier MK2 it can reach a speed up to 11.1 m/s

it is made out of 334 parts

How to use

Use the motor wheels to get it in to the water

do not enter the water in more than 7 m/s

then start the engines and throttle to max
